title: Automatic Bullets!
message:
Automatic Bullets!

If a user starts typing a list using one of the markdown list prefixes
(-, +, *), let's help them out by automatically inserting a new bullet
when they add a line break.

Users can add multiple levels for the list and we'll automatically add
the necessary spaces.

Adding a line break on an empty list item will either decrement the list
level or remove the empty item.

Fixes #223
